issues.description: The solution implementation declares toString() with the signature 'public Object toString()' (solution_repository/src/de/tum/cit/ase/Lecture.java lines 62-66). The problem text and UML expect a custom toString() that returns a String (problem_statement.md lines 36-38). Declaring toString() to return Object does not correctly override java.lang.Object.toString() (which returns String) and will cause a compilation error and/or confusion for students about the expected method signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the toString() method signature in the solution (and ensure the template guidance) to 'public String toString()' so it correctly overrides Object.toString(). Return a String (as already constructed) and keep the @Override annotation. Example: '@Override public String toString() { return "Lecture{" + ... + '}'; }'.
